wikipedia_page.main: Charles Frederick Reiner (15 February 1884 – 9 January 1947) was an English first-class cricketer active 1906–08 who played for Surrey. He was born in Sutton, Surrey; died in Maida Vale.

response: Paul Stewart is a Canadian pianist. Brought up in New Glasgow, Nova Scotia, he started learning piano at the age of five. He initially studied with a local teacher, and subsequently with Tietje Zonnefeld in Halifax, Nova Scotia. At the age of 18 he moved to attend McGill University in Montreal, where he studied with Charles Reiner. He later studied with Kendall Taylor in London and Arturo Benedetti Michelangeli in Italy.
